text:
Colm J. Meaney (; born 30 May 1953) is an Irish actor. He is known for playing Miles O'Brien in ' (1987–1994) and ' (1993–1999). He has appeared in other TV shows including "Law & Order", "The Simpsons" and "Hell on Wheels". His movie credits include "The Barrytown Trilogy" (1991–1996), "Con Air" (1997), "Intermission" (2003), "The Damned United" (2009), "Get Him to the Greek" (2010), ' (2013) and "The Journey" (2016).
Meaney was born in Glasnevin, Dublin. He has been married twice and has two daughters. He lives in Sóller, Mallorca of the Spanish Balearic Islands.
